name: A Life At Stake
description:
You must live a life, avoid prison and death, gamble, date, workout and drink yourself to victory (a royal one).

A Life At Stake is our teams entry for Ludum Dare 43. Our team members this time were Raffe, Jokku, Happy Tomato and me (JustMars).

Changes in version 1.0.1:

  • Darkened text color for rejection
  • Added sounds for buttons in main menu 
  •  Altered some text positions
  •  Fixed roulette sometimes stopping at a wrong position 
  •  Reduced build size
